perturbation.original_text: This Marketing Affiliate Agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into this 8th day of May 2014, by and between BIRCH FIRST GLOBAL INVESTMENTS INC., a corporation incorporated in the U.S. Virgin Islands, with its main place of business located 9100 Havensight, Port of Sale, Ste. 15/16, St. Thomas, VI 0080 (referred to as "Company") and MOUNT KNOWLEDGE HOLDINGS INC. and/or assigns, a corporation incorporated in the State of Nevada, with its main place of business located at 228 Park Avenue S. #56101 New York, NY 10003­1502 (referred to as "Marketing Affiliate" or "MA").
perturbation.changed_text: This Marketing Affiliate Agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into this 8th day of May 2014, by and between BIRCH FIRST GLOBAL INVESTMENTS INC., a corporation incorporated in the U.S. Virgin Islands, with its main place of business located 9100 Havensight, Port of Sale, Ste. 15/16, St. Thomas, VI 0080 (referred to as "Company") and MOUNT KNOWLEDGE HOLDINGS INC. and/or assigns, a corporation incorporated in the State of Nevada, with its main place of business located at 228 Park Avenue S. #56101 New York, NY 10003­1502 (referred to as "Marketing Partner" or "MA").
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Marketing Affiliate' is changed to 'Marketing Partner'. Later in the document, obligations are tied to 'Marketing Affiliate,' creating ambiguity as to whether 'Marketing Partner' shares those same obligations.

perturbation.original_text: MA shall keep accurate records of the sales of the Technology and Maintenance, including Client Registration Cards and shall make these records available for review by a representative of Company within ten (10) business days following the end of each month.
perturbation.changed_text: MA shall keep accurate records of the sales of the Technology and Maintenance, including Customer Enrollment Forms and shall make these records available for review by an authorized representative of Company within fifteen (15) business days following the end of each month.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Client Registration Cards' is changed to 'Customer Enrollment Forms' and the time available for review is updated to 15 days. This creates confusion on what forms must be shared and what is the exact deadline for this. This confusion will lead to disagreement between both parties on what is expected and when.

perturbation.original_text: MA agrees to distribute Technology only through the Company License Agreement/Client Registration Card between the Client and Company. MA acknowledges that the Company License Agreement/ Client Registration Card specifies the terms under which a Client receives, holds and uses the Package or Service.
perturbation.changed_text: MA agrees to distribute Technology only through the Company License Agreement/User Subscription Form between the Client and Company. MA acknowledges that the Company License Agreement/ Customer Subscription Form specifies the terms under which a Client receives, holds and uses the Package or Service.
perturbation.explanation: The document interchanges 'Client Registration Card' with 'User Subscription Form', and 'Customer Subscription Form'. This creates conflicting obligations and what documents are needed. If one is valid and not the other the document will be in breach.
